title: Lonescale Hiring Signal - Send leads to lemlist and Hubspot
author: Lucas Perret
readme:
Job offers are a goldmine of information.

Use them to boost your outreach results.

They'll give you:

  * more context to personalize your messaging
  * a steady flow of new leads
  * the right timing to contact your lead
readme_html:
Job offers are a goldmine of information.

Use them to boost your outreach results.

They'll give you:

  • more context to personalize your messaging
  • a steady flow of new leads
  • the right timing to contact your lead
readme_zh:
招聘信息是座信息金矿。

善用它们能提升你的外联成效：

  * 获取更多背景信息，实现消息个性化定制  
  * 持续获得新鲜潜在客户资源  
  * 掌握联系候选人的最佳时机  

（注：根据中文表达习惯进行了以下优化：
1. 将"goldmine"译为"金矿"并添加"座"量词
2. "boost your outreach results"意译为"提升外联成效"更符合商务场景
3. 采用四字短语"善用它们"使开头更简洁有力
4. 条目式翻译时使用中文项目符号"·"
5. "leads"在不同语境分别译为"潜在客户"和"候选人"以符合人力资源场景
6. 添加"掌握"作为动词使"the right timing"的翻译更完整）
title_zh: 孤独等级招聘信号 - 将潜在客户发送至lemlist和HubSpot
